title: Construction of a two Storied Building to cater to the additional student intake of the Faculty of Management Studies and Commerce University of Sri Jayewardenepura
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, to implement the above project at a total cost of Rs. 40 million, with the view to providing accommodation to the additional student intake and to entrust the construction work to the Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau (CECB), was approved by the Cabinet.
